title: Why can't I post respond to post?
body: I just want to respond to posts. I have a level 30 summoner account, but the board says can't post till level 7 or higher...

replies.body: Your account may need to sync with the boards when posting for the first time.  Your post looks to have bumped your profile to 30 now, so everything should be fine!  Let me know if you still have any trouble.
